meanings.definition: To make or become one; unite or merge.
meanings.sent1: The teacher unifies the class by encouraging teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The choir unifies their voices to create beautiful music.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces unifies to reveal a stunning picture.
meanings.sent4: Her speech unifies the audience in a shared sense of purpose.
meanings.sent5: The recipe unifies the flavors perfectly for a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: To bring together different elements into a single, coherent whole.
meanings.sent1: The artist unifies colors to create a harmonious painting.
meanings.sent2: The architect unifies form and function in the building design.
meanings.sent3: The magician unifies various tricks into a captivating performance.
meanings.sent4: The chef unifies diverse ingredients into a flavorful dish.
meanings.sent5: The conductor unifies the instruments to produce a symphonic masterpiece.
